alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:04PM CDT until August 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TIPTON...WESTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHWESTERN HAYWOOD AND NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Arlington, or 16 miles northeast of Cordova, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Cordova, Lakeland, Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Mason, Piperton, Gallaway, Stanton, Braden, Asbury, Lenow, Yum Yum, Belmont, Shepp and Hickory Withe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
